name: responsible-ai-demo
description: Responsible AI Usage Demo App for Engineering Teams

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.typecheck: cd backend && npx tsc --noEmit && cd ../frontend && npx tsc --noEmit
